title: eCasas Web Host Name
desc: The DNS name for the casas web server (e.g. ecasas.ed)

title: eCasas Web Server IP
desc: IP address of the eCasas web server

title: eCasas Database Host Name
desc: The DNS name for the casas database server (e.g. ecasasdb.ed)

title: eCasas Database Server IP
desc: IP address of the eCasas database server
